snippet: An article on the controversy involving Rachel Beyda, a Jewish student questioned by a student council about her views, drew hundreds of comments.
lead_paragraph: An article on the controversy involving Rachel Beyda, a Jewish student questioned by a student council about her views, drew hundreds of comments.

headline.main: Readers Drawn Into Debate Over U.C.L.A. Student’s Jewish Background
headline.print_headline: Readers Drawn Into Debate Over U.C.L.A. Student’s Jewish Background
